title: Package Rush Directly Download
description:
Have you ever had your package delayed? Would you like to fix it? In Package Rush you run your own delivery company. Package Rush is a strategy game about planning a delivery route system in a fast- growing city. Build and modify routes to get all packages on time. How long can you keep delivering? The city is growing. More and more orders are coming in, and there is less and less time to fulfill them. Paper Cut Mansion
The demand for your company’s services is increasing. You’ll be constantly managing your route system to meet the changing conditions and be as efficient as possible. Deliver packages and get upgrades. Each upgrade has its own unique effect and rarity. You can decide whether to use it now or save it for later stages. Upgrades can have a big impact if used wisely Warehouse explosion, Stop time, Cards shuffling, Mystery Orders and more.
